ResearchController - Class in it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelController.controller.research
This controller manages all clicks made on the ResearchView.
ResearchController(Stage, ResearchView) - Constructor for class it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelController.controller.research.ResearchController
The constructor of ResearchController takes 2 parameters as input and calls the serResearchListener() method to manage all the events that occur on the ResearchView
